detectors.description:
Twitter.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#14-78) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 20000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[Twitter.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L14-L78) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 20000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Twitter.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#23-25)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Twitter.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#29-31)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Twitter.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#33-35)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#8)
	- Twitter.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#62-66)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Twitter.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#37-46)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#9)
